CustomMetadata.label: SMS Sent To Cancel Site Visit

values.value:
Hi, Your site visit scheduled for {{Enquiry__c.Site_Visit_Time__c}} on {{Enquiry__c.Site_Visit_Date__c}} at {{Enquiry__c.Project_Name__c}} has been cancelled. To reschedule your visit, please call us on {{Enquiry__c.contactNumber}}
-Dynamix Group
